titles.title: Earmark Elimination Act of 2015
To prohibit the consideration in the House of Representatives of any legislation containing an earmark.
Earmark Elimination Act of 2015

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Rules.

bill.summary:
Earmark Elimination Act of 2015
Makes it out of order in the House of Representatives to consider a bill, joint resolution, or any other measure that includes a congressional earmark or limited tax or tariff benefit.
Makes a conforming amendment to Rule XXI (Restrictions on Certain Bills) of the Rules of the House of Representatives.
